testCases.label: Verify single-argument constructor with 'Frodo'
testCases.description: Tests that creating a Player with name 'Frodo' correctly sets playerName to 'Frodo' and initializes level to 1

testCases.label: Verify single-argument constructor with 'Sam'
testCases.description: Tests that creating a Player with name 'Sam' correctly sets playerName to 'Sam' and initializes level to 1

testCases.label: Verify two-argument constructor with name and level
testCases.description: Tests that creating a Player with name 'Gollum' and level 5 correctly sets playerName to 'Gollum' and level to 5
